entries.title: Setting color values
lines: color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 0.5); //sets text color to blue with 50% alpha (transparency)
background: hsl(9, 100%, 64%); //sets background to salmon-like color
background-color: hsla(9, 100%, 64%, 0.5); //sets background to salmon-like with alpha of 50%
entries.description: In CSS, you can set color values by using their HEX, RGB, RGBA, and HSL values

entries.title: Changing background color of the page
lines: background: green; // sets the background to green

entries.title: setting the background to an image
Change the position of the background image
lines: background-position: top left; // sets image position to top left
background-position: center right; //sets image position to center right
background-position: center center; //positions background image to center

entries.title: Style an element after a div
entries.description: This will select all elements that appear directly after a div

entries.title: Style the first element inside a div
entries.description: This will select the first element inside every div

entries.title: Style elements where the mouse click is held down
entries.description: When the mouse is held down on a button, the button background will go black, and foreground will go white

entries.title: Style elements where the user is hovering
entries.description: Whenever the user hovers over a link, the text will go purple

entries.title: Setting the border color of an element
lines: border: 2px solid blue; // sets border width, style, and color

entries.title: Set variables in CSS
entries.description: Starting a css property name with double dashes (--) will tell css it is a variable

entries.title: Spaces between letters, words, and lines
lines: letter-spacing: 3px; // increases the space between letters

entries.title: Set font of text
entries.description: In order to use custom web fonts, you will need to import the stylesheet for the font, before setting it.

entries.title: Link an external stylesheet to my document
entries.description: Add this to the <head> tag of your document, making sure the href attribute points to your css file

entries.title: Link an external script to my document
entries.description: Add this to your document, making sure that the src attribute points to the URL of the script.
